QuestData.Title: A New Vision
QuestData.Description: Please tell the Elder Sage Rain-Zhu that I will begin my work at once.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Sage Rain-Zhu near the courtyard in the Temple of the Jade Serpent in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful! Knowing that the scryer has returned to his meditations has lifted a great burden from my shoulders.
